trans-unit.source: Represents a callback delegate that has been registered with a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa um delegado de retorno de chamada que foi registrado com um <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: The callback is called when the token is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O retorno de chamada é chamado quando o token é cancelado.

trans-unit.source: To unregister a callback, dispose the corresponding Registration instance.
trans-unit.target: Para cancelar o registro de um retorno de chamada, descarte a instância de registro correspondente.

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações e exemplos de código, consulte [cancelamento em Threads gerenciados](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md).

trans-unit.source: All public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> have completed.
trans-unit.target: Todos os membros protegidos e públicos da <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> são thread-safe e podem ser usados simultaneamente em vários segmentos, com exceção de Dispose, que só deve ser usado quando todas as outras operações no <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> concluiu.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pela instância atual da classe <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar `Dispose` quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O `Dispose` método deixa o <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar `Dispose`, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar `Dispose` antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a instância <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> atual é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The other object to which to compare this instance.
trans-unit.target: O outro objeto ao qual comparar essa instância.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a instância <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> atual é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: True, if both this and <paramref name="obj" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: True, se este e <paramref name="obj" /> forem iguais.

trans-unit.source: False, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: Two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal if they both refer to the output of a single call to the same Register method of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> são iguais se elas se referirem à saída de uma única chamada para o mesmo método Register de um <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: The other <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> to which to compare this instance.
trans-unit.target: O outro <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> ao qual comparar essa instância.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a instância <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> atual é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: True, if both this and <paramref name="other" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: True, se este e <paramref name="other" /> forem iguais.

trans-unit.source: False, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: Two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal if they both refer to the output of a single call to the same Register method of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> são iguais se elas se referirem à saída de uma única chamada para o mesmo método Register de um <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
trans-unit.target: Serve como uma função de hash para <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash da instância <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The first instance.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância.

trans-unit.source: The second instance.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: True if the instances are equal; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se as instâncias forem iguais, caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: The first instance.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância.

trans-unit.source: The second instance.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: True if the instances are not equal; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se as instâncias não forem iguais, caso contrário, false.
